channel.title: JAR file not loading client connection error retrying in
channel.description: I'm trying to create a JAR file that I can send to my friends so they can login to my server. I've created the file with JAR maker but when I click on it, it loads the client window then says connection error retrying in... then it counts down. Any ideas?

item.title: JAR file not loading client connection error retrying in
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Draconian Mr.Draconian
item.description:
@Mr.Draconian wrote:

Cachedownloader error.
there are lots of better working cache downloaders.
I suggest using aggroth v4’s downloader.
works perfectly fine.

Read full topic
item.source: JAR file not loading client connection error retrying in
